Articles.Content: While roving to the south pole of the Mun I placed a flag on a nice flat area with 0.7 slope (useful for marking landing spots). I even named it .7 Slope, Nice view of Kerbin. When I went back later to check on it, it was sitting on area of 3.0 slope! So I sent a lander to investigate and found it was about 150m away from the original patch of 0.7 slope. What's up with that?
